Social Media Executive & CRM Officer Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is the most sought-after Human Resource Solution Provider with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We have a reputation for satisfying and surpassing clients expectations through our core offerings: Recruitment and Selection, Outsourcing, Training and Development. To accomplish these we leverage on creating and managing change in organizations by improving efficiency through our proven and dynamic HR solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Executive & CRM Officer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Marketing / Communications

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a creative and data-driven Social Media Executive & CRM Officer to manage our online presence and customer engagement strategies.
	This professional will be responsible for developing and executing social media campaigns, managing customer databases, and optimizing communication to enhance brand loyalty and customer satisfaction.


Key Responsibilities
Social Media Management:


	Develop and implement social media strategies across platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, TikTok, etc.)
	Create engaging content (text, image, video) aligned with brand voice and marketing goals
	Monitor, analyze, and report on social media performance metrics
	Respond to comments, messages, and mentions in a timely and professional manner
	Collaborate with design and content teams to ensure consistent branding
	Stay updated on social media trends and best practices


CRM Management:


	Maintain and update the customer database (CRM system)
	Segment audiences for targeted campaigns and communications
	Design and execute email marketing campaigns and customer journeys
	Analyze customer behavior and feedback to improve engagement and retention
	Coordinate with sales and customer service teams to ensure seamless customer experience
	Generate reports on CRM performance and customer insights


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field
	2+ years of experience in social media management and CRM systems
	Proficiency in tools like Meta Business Suite, Hootsuite, HubSpot, Salesforce, or similar
	Strong writing, editing, and visual storytelling skills
	Analytical mindset with experience in data interpretation and reporting
	Ability to multitask and manage multiple campaigns simultaneously
	Creative, proactive, and detail-oriented


Preferred Attributes:


	Experience in paid social media advertising
	Knowledge of digital marketing principles
	Familiarity with customer lifecycle and retention strategies
	Graphic design or video editing skills (Canva, Adobe Suite, etc.)


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Tax Officer Job at Tophire Africa




        
    

        
        Tophire Africa  - Our client, a large and diversified Conglomerate in Renewable Energy, Hospitality, Power, Oil & Gas, Real Estate, and the Financial Services sector, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Tax Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Tax Officer will be responsible for managing the organization’s tax compliance, planning, reporting, and advisory functions.
	The role requires strong technical tax knowledge, hands-on experience with statutory filings, and the ability to manage tax matters across multiple sectors.


Key Responsibilities


	Ensure compliance with all statutory tax obligations including CIT, VAT, WHT, PAYE, and other relevant taxes.
	Prepare and review tax computations, filings, and returns in line with regulatory requirements.
	Liaise with tax authorities and manage tax audits, assessments, and correspondence.
	Support tax planning initiatives to optimize tax efficiency while ensuring compliance.
	Monitor changes in tax laws and regulations and assess their impact on the business.
	Provide tax advisory support to business units across the group.
	Maintain accurate tax records and documentation.
	Support management with tax reports and insights for decision-making.


Key Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess B.Sc / HND in any relevant field
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in a similar tax role.
	Experience working in a large organization or group structure is highly desirable.
	Prior experience in any of the Big 4 accounting firms is a strong advantage.
	Solid knowledge of Nigerian tax laws and regulatory frameworks.
	Strong analytical, reporting, and problem-solving skills.
	High attention to detail and ability to work under pressure.
	Professional certifications (e.g., ICAN, ACCA, CITN) will be an added advantage.


Personal Attributes:


	High level of integrity and professionalism.
	Strong commercial awareness and business acumen.
	Proactive, detail-oriented, and results-driven.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively across teams.


Salary
N500,000 - N600,000 / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Data Analyst Job at Smartflow Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Smartflow Technologies Limited is Nigeria's foremost Flow and Level Automation company, delivering premium and yet cost-effective solutions to clients with unparalleled professionalism and skill. In addition to being an engineering focused organization, Smartflow Technologies is involved in the supply, installation and support of fueling systems and equipment, including but not limited to Pumps and Dispensers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analyst

Job Location: Ojodu Berger, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Conducting remote site monitoring of all ATG (Automatic Tank Gauging), FMS (Fuel Management Systems), and fuel pumps.
	Generating and submitting a daily tank level report to ensure real-time stock visibility.
	Preparing accurate calibration charts upon receiving raw data from the field.
	Creating and submitting Requests for Purchase Orders when site stock hits the reorder level.
	Delivering Proof of Delivery documentation within 24 hours, following the collection of Fuel Receipt Notes and LPOs.
	Compiling and delivering comprehensive weekly and monthly fuel transaction reports.
	Producing detailed monthly fuel consumption reports to aid operational planning.
	Creating monthly maintenance reports to support system reliability and compliance.
	Updating and tracking calibration milestones across all relevant systems.
	Strictly adhering to all company occupational health and safety (OHS) policies and procedures.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Data Analytics, Management, or any related field.
	2+ years of experience in a BI or analytical role.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and data reporting tools.
	Exceptional attention to detail, organizational skills, and ability to manage multiple reports.
	Strong communication skills and a collaborative approach to cross-functional work.
	Knowledge on occupational health and safety.
